instructions: Place the charger on the table cloth and near its bottom
Place the dinner fork, with the tines pointing up, on the left side of the charger
Place the dinner knife, with the blade facing the charger, on the right side of the charger
Place the salad fork, with the tines pointing up, on the left side of the dinner fork
Place the salad knife, with the blade facing the charger, on the right side of the dinner knife
Place the soup spoon, with the bowl pointing up, on the right side of the salad knife
Place the dessert spoon, with the bowl pointing towards the dinner fork, above the charger
Place the dessert fork, with tines pointing to the dinner knife, between the charger and dessert spoon
Place the bread plate above the salad and dinner fork
Place the butter knife, with the blade facing the top left corner of the table cloth, on the bread plate
Place the water glass above the dinner and salad knives
Place the napkin on the middle of the plate
